title: ZK I Zettel 7,2mb4 - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body: 7,2mb4 Weitere Belege für die Verknüpfung des Wertgedan-kens mit dem einer Vorziehensregel: Kimball Young, Sociology: A Study of Society and Culture,2 Aufl., NY 1949, p. 110 (zit. nach Adler, S. 274) versteht unterWert "a combination of ideas and attitudes which givesa scale of preference or priority to motives and goalsas well as to a course of action from motive to goal". John Lewis Gillin / John Philip Gillin, Cultural Sociology,NY 1948, p .157: "the value of a thing is its worth ordesirability as compared with something else". Rose, S. 5 (vgl. Def. 7,2,3) Raymond Firth, The Study of Value by Social Anthropologists("The Marett Lecture", London 1953), cf. Man CCXXXI (1953), S. 1-8,zit. nach Belshaw, S. 557
